Name: jitsi-jvb
Overview: Jitsi Videobridge image for Jitsi Meet

JVB_PORT.Name: JVB_PORT
JVB_PORT.Description: Media port for the Jitsi Videobridge

JVB_TCP_PORT.Name: JVB_TCP_PORT
JVB_TCP_PORT.Description: TCP Fallback for Jitsi Videobridge for when UDP isn’t available

DOCKER_HOST_ADDRESS.Name: DOCKER_HOST_ADDRESS
DOCKER_HOST_ADDRESS.Description: IP address of the Docker host, needed for LAN environments

XMPP_AUTH_DOMAIN.Name: XMPP_AUTH_DOMAIN
XMPP_AUTH_DOMAIN.Description: Internal XMPP domain for authenticated services

XMPP_INTERNAL_MUC_DOMAIN.Name: XMPP_INTERNAL_MUC_DOMAIN
XMPP_INTERNAL_MUC_DOMAIN.Description: XMPP domain for the internal MUC

JVB_AUTH_USER.Name: JVB_AUTH_USER
JVB_AUTH_USER.Description: XMPP user for JVB MUC client connections

JVB_AUTH_PASSWORD.Name: JVB_AUTH_PASSWORD
JVB_AUTH_PASSWORD.Description: XMPP password for JVB MUC client connections

JVB_BREWERY_MUC.Name: JVB_BREWERY_MUC
JVB_BREWERY_MUC.Description: MUC name for the JVB pool

JVB_TCP_HARVESTER_DISABLED.Name: JVB_TCP_HARVESTER_DISABLED
JVB_TCP_HARVESTER_DISABLED.Description: Disable the additional harvester which allows video over TCP (rather than just UDP)

JVB_STUN_SERVERS.Name: JVB_STUN_SERVERS
JVB_STUN_SERVERS.Description: STUN servers used to discover the server's public IP

JVB_ENABLE_APIS.Name: JVB_ENABLE_APIS
JVB_ENABLE_APIS.Description: Comma separated list of JVB APIs to enable
